subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Columbus Blue Jackets re-signed the restricted free agent goalie Pascal Leclaire to a three-year contract through the 2010-11 season. Leclaire, 25, is coming off his best season, going 24-17-6 with a 2.25 goals against average, a .919 save percentage and nine shutouts in 54 games.
